exceptions.summary:
Thrown when no case matches the schema or type. <see cref="P:System.AggregateException.InnerExceptions" />
            will be contain the exceptions thrown by each case.

memberSignatures.value: public virtual Func<System.IO.Stream,T> BuildDelegate<T> (Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema schema, System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary<ValueTuple<Type,Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema>,Delegate> cache = null);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Func`2<class System.IO.Stream, !!T> BuildDelegate<T>(class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema schema, class System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary`2<valuetype System.ValueTuple`2<class System.Type, class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema>, class System.Delegate> cache) cil managed

parameters.name: schema
parameters.summary: The schema to map to the type.

parameters.name: cache
parameters.summary:
An optional delegate cache. The cache can be used to provide custom implementations for
            particular type-schema pairs, and it will also be populated as the delegate is built.

returns.summary: A function that accepts a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and returns a deserialized object.

overloads.summary: Builds a delegate that reads a serialized object from a stream.

typeParameters.name: T
typeParameters.summary:
The type of object to be deserialized. If the type is a class or a struct, it must have
            a parameterless public constructor.
